sqlGroup.name: car
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT ci.*, mcfc.*, md.device_code, mu.username as agentName -- @where FROM mo_car_info ci LEFT JOIN mo_car_failure_criteria mcfc ON ci.id = mcfc.car_id LEFT JOIN mo_device md ON md.id = ci.device_id LEFT JOIN mo_user mu ON mu.id = ci.agent -- @condition WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT ci.*, mcfc.*, md.device_code, mu.username as agentName -- @where FROM mo_car_info ci LEFT JOIN mo_car_failure_criteria mcfc ON ci.id = mcfc.car_id LEFT JOIN mo_device md ON md.id = ci.device_id LEFT JOIN mo_user mu ON mu.id = ci.agent -- @condition WHERE exists(select 1 from mo_car_permission mcp where mcp.car_id = ci.id and mcp.user_id = ?)

SELECT ci.*, mcfc.*, md.device_code, mu.username as agentName -- @where FROM mo_car_info ci LEFT JOIN mo_car_failure_criteria mcfc ON ci.id = mcfc.car_id LEFT JOIN mo_device md ON md.id = ci.device_id LEFT JOIN mo_user mu ON mu.id = ci.agent -- @condition WHERE ci.operator = ?
SELECT count(*) c, mi.car_flag, d.name FROM mo_car_info mi LEFT JOIN mo_dict d ON d. code = mi.car_flag AND d.parent = (select id FROM mo_dict WHERE code='YIIBFH') WHERE mi.device_id IS NOT NULL

SELECT count(*) c,t.name from (SELECT CASE WHEN engine_discharge_value BETWEEN 0 and 1 THEN '1L' WHEN engine_discharge_value BETWEEN 1 and 2 THEN '2L' WHEN engine_discharge_value BETWEEN 2 and 3 THEN '3L' WHEN engine_discharge_value BETWEEN 3 and 4 THEN '4L' WHEN engine_discharge_value BETWEEN 4 and 5 THEN '5L' WHEN engine_discharge_value BETWEEN 5 and 6 THEN '6L' WHEN engine_discharge_value BETWEEN 6 and 7 THEN '7L' ELSE '8L' END as name FROM mo_car_info WHERE 1=1 AND device_id IS NOT NULL ) t GROUP BY t.name
SELECT COUNT(*) c,ma.`name` FROM mo_car_info mi LEFT JOIN mo_area ma ON ma.sn = mi.area_sn WHERE 1=1 and ma.name is NOT NULL AND ma.sn LIKE ? GROUP BY ma.name
SELECT count(*) c,ma.`name`,left(mi.`area_sn`,4) as a FROM mo_car_info mi left join mo_area ma on ma.sn = left(mi.`area_sn`,4) WHERE 1=1 and ma.name is not null GROUP BY ma.name

SELECT mu.id, mu.name, mu.phone, mu.username, mu.birthday, mu.gender, mu.create_time, type, mcpn.cn as assign -- @where FROM mo_user mu LEFT JOIN (select count(1) cn , mcp.user_id from mo_car_permission mcp where mcp.car_id = ? GROUP BY mcp.user_id) mcpn ON mcpn.user_id = mu.id -- @condition WHERE mu.type = ?
SELECT COUNT(1) c FROM mo_car_info WHERE device_id = ? AND id != ?
